projects.title: Neon Studio
projects.description: A modern web application showcasing neon-themed design elements and interactive animations. Built with React and Three.js for immersive 3D experiences.

projects.title: XR Landing
projects.description: An immersive landing page for XR experiences featuring spatial design and interactive elements. Optimized for both desktop and mobile VR/AR viewing experiences.

projects.title: Gummy Brand
projects.description: Complete brand identity system for a confectionery company with playful animations and vibrant colors. Includes logo design, packaging concepts, and digital marketing materials.

projects.title: AI Chat Interface
projects.description: A sleek chat interface powered by AI with real-time message streaming and voice input capabilities. Features custom animations and responsive design for seamless user experience.

projects.title: Data Visualization
projects.description: Interactive data visualization dashboard with real-time updates and customizable chart types. Built with D3.js and WebGL for smooth animations and large dataset handling.

projects.title: Mobile App Design
projects.description: Complete mobile app design system with custom components and micro-interactions. Includes user flow diagrams, wireframes, and high-fidelity prototypes.

projects.title: Web Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive web platform with user authentication, dashboard, and API integration. Built with Next.js and TypeScript for scalability and maintainability.

projects.title: Creative Tools
projects.description: A suite of creative tools for designers including color palette generators and asset libraries. Features collaborative workspaces and cloud synchronization.

projects.title: Portfolio Site
projects.description: A modern portfolio website with 3D animations and interactive elements. Showcases projects with smooth transitions and responsive design.
